author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jet Airways Celebrates World Tourism Day with Attractive JetEscapes HolidaysTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jet Airways Celebrates World Tourism Day with Attractive JetEscapes Holidays
Jet Airways, India’s premier international airline, today announced attractively priced, customized, all-inclusive JetEscapes Holidays to commemorate World Tourism Day (September 27).
The exciting all-inclusive JetEscapes Holidays includes return Economy Class air tickets, airport transfers, three star hotel accommodation with breakfast and sightseeing. Put together to show case the many facets of India, guests can opt for travel to popular destinations such as Goa, Gangtok, Pelling and Darjeeling in the East, to Shimla, Manali in Himachal Pradesh and Chandigarh, Andaman, Kerala, Delhi, Agra and Jaipur. Jet Airways guests can also benefit from the special World Tourism Day offers to sought – after international destinations like Thailand, Singapore, Vietnam, London, Brussels and Paris.
Some of the wide-ranging attractions include JetEscapes’ six night seven day ‘Discover East package’ which will take visitors to a sightseeing tour of Gangtok covering Rumtek Monastery, Jhakri Water Fall, Tshangu Lake, Rimbi Hydro Project and Tiger Hills among others.
Again, for those opting to visit Andaman for a four night, five day exclusive holiday can visit Corbyn’s Cove Beach, 9 kms from Port Blair, a coconut palm fringed beach ideal for swimming, sun-basking and bathing. In the evening, guests can attend the alluring sound and light show at Cellular Jail.
JetEscapes guests travelling overseas get to experience magnificent sights of a Parisian nightlife and the beautiful architecture of Paris on a Seinorama tour. One of the top tourist destinations, Paris offers attractions around history, art, culture, gastronomy, apart from being the fashion capital. Guests can also visit Disneyland Paris, one of the most popular and world-class family attractions.
The ‘Thailand Tango’ from JetEscapes offers guests a unique experience of Bangkok’s finest temples, leisure and wildlife park tours and an easy paced beach experience on the Coral Island. The tour includes an interesting Nong Nooch village visit – a sprawling recreational park in typical Thai setting.
JetEscapes guests in Singapore, the ‘Lion City’ can take in the famous night safari and go on a nature trail for a wild adventure. Likewise, guests can explore this vibrant island city, stop at the iconic Merlion for a photograph, or visit Mt. Fabre for a splendid view of the Harbour.
Holidays start from an attractive INR 17,470 and are also available for travel in Premiere and stay in four and five star hotels.
Members of the JetPrivilege loyalty programme will get a chance to earn 5 JPMiles on every Rs. 100 spent while they avail of these packages.
According to Mr. Gaurang Shetty- Sr. VP Commercial, Jet Airways, “The introduction of these unique and customised all inclusive JetEscapes holidays, is our way of commemorating World Tourism Day in conjunction with the ongoing global celebration that is Incredible India. The all-inclusive JetEscapes holidays are thus, our way of showcasing the beauty and diversity that is India to our discerning domestic and international guests. The international holidays on offer will also give Indian’s an exceptionally convenient, affordable and ideal getaway option this festive season and in the New Year. We are confident that our holiday packages will prove to be extremely popular with guests.”
Source:- Jet Airways
